channel.title: Hoster
channel.description: Im not sure if this is in the right section, but i need a hoster for my new server, if you are willing to host this server, please reply, I will do all the coding if so needed, the client deob is 317, so please, need a host :cool:

item.title: Hoster
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You cannot ask for hosters on this website.
If you want one you will have to buy one; a vps or a dedicated server to run your server.

Read full topic
